name: Detective Mug: The Case of a House Killer
name_original: Detective Mug: The Case of a House Killer
description:
Detectove Mug is a short (5-15min) pixel-art, point and click expierence. In which you have to solve a MURDER *insert dramatic effects here*

The game has 3 endings, one of which is the correct one (Im not going to tell which one :3, you will have to solve it!)

NOTE: This is one of my 1st games made, so dont expect the same expierence as some AAA game..
